column1: # Single source of truth for the wowx comparison test harness.
# Tab-separated. Shell-parseable with: IFS=$'\t' read -r gem exe flag tags
#   gem_name       — the gem name as passed to `wowx` (and `gem install`)
#   executable     — the binary that the gem provides (from gemspec executables)
#   version_flag   — flag to print version (--version, -v, version)
#   tags           — comma-separated: native (C ext), meta (binary in a dep)
